name: The Worst Party: A Healers Tale
name_original: The Worst Party: A Healers Tale
description: You've joined a random group for a dungeon crawler. The only problem is you're the healer and the whole team is just the worst. You have no control over the Tank constantly pushing too far ahead, or the gear crazed rogue running off for some loot, or the DPS warrior going afk to grab some pizza. Do your best to keep this team alive and make it through this procedural generated dungeon adventure.
